CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HAM_Alum_Suffix__c)), HAM_Alum_Suffix__c & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HAM_Surv_Spouse_Suffix__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(HAM_Parent_Suffix__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(HAM_GP_Suffix__c)), ", ", "" ), "" ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HAM_Surv_Spouse_Suffix__c)), HAM_Surv_Spouse_Suffix__c & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HAM_Parent_Suffix__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(HAM_GP_Suffix__c)), ", ", "" ), "" ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HAM_Parent_Suffix__c)), HAM_Parent_Suffix__c & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HAM_GP_Suffix__c)), ", ", "" ), "" ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(HAM_GP_Suffix__c)), HAM_GP_Suffix__c, "" )
CustomField.label: Institutional Suffix
